Description: --> Kramer SM-1 Seymour Duncan Electric Guitar (Vintage White) Used This item is slightly used and has been thoroughly checked out by our experts to make sure it is in perfect working condition. We then re-sealed it in its original packaging with all factory included accessories. This item is guaranteed to be in "as new" condition and has virtually no cosmetic imperfections. This item is covered with a one year warranty from Sam Ash. Powered by the name that is synonymous with tone, The Kramer SM-1 Seymour Duncan Electric Guitar has the classic style that has been at the forefront of hard rock and heavy metal going back to the 1980’s. Sporting a double cutaway mahogany body, this metal machine means business. The body is heavily contoured and features extra beveling along the lower horn for easier access to the upper frets. The SM-1 is powered with a pair of Cool Rails single coil pickups and an Alternative 8 humbucking pickup in the bridge position, with a master volume, master tone, and a 5-way selector. The 2 single coil/bridge humbucker (H-S-S) design has been one of the most popular electronic layouts in today’s landscape of hard rock and heavy metal. These pickups will deliver a wide range of tones from retro, to up to the minute metal. The Volume on the Kramer SM-1 Seymour Duncan Electric Guitar features what Kramer calls the "treble bleed" mod that lets you keep your tone bright when backing down the volume control.The “through-neck” design maple 25.5"-scale neck has been carved into an ultra-fast thin taper profile and topped with 24 Jumbo frets for extremely fast playability and effortless string-bending. Finally, the black hardware includes a set of die-cast tuners; along with a Floyd Rose locking tremolo that will keep you in tune, and withstand even the most aggressive divebomb soloing. The Kramer SM-1 Seymour Duncan Electric Guitar is built to metal approved specs and is ready to rock.
